titleInfo.title: 'Plan of the attack of Ras Ul Khyma by the force under Sir Willm. Gr. Keir K.M.T., between the 3rd & 9th of December 1819’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on paperDimensions:410 x 320 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Landmarks lettered for reference with a key below title in the bottom left-hand corner.Shows the position of the British army and the enemy’s guns.Explanation note bottom right.Inscriptions:On verso: 'Rec. 11th July 1820'.Centre [illegible] 'Produced in Camp Basul Khyma 10th Dec. 1819'.
